appsgate.lig.clock.sensor.impl
Class SwingClock

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.clock.sensor.impl.SwingClock
All Implemented Interfaces:
CoreClockSpec, CoreObjectSpec, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
public class SwingClock
extends java.lang.Object
implements CoreClockSpec, CoreObjectSpec, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

This java interface is an ApAM specification shared by all ApAM AppsGate application to provide current Time and Date information
